name: SKATE BANANA BTX SNOWBOARD
description: When you're dropping in on the Lib Tech Skate Banana BTX Snowboard, there is no time for selfies - just face shots and perfectly greased rails. The BTX rocker makes for a playful yet predictable ride on any terrain but truly excels as a jibbing machine.

name: JOY DRIVER SNOWBOARD 2017
description: Whether you're heading out to a new zone of pillow stacks, hill-banging resort laps on beautiful windpack, or sessioning that big booter you built just out the gates, you need a hard-charging, versatile board that can handle it all. Enter the K2 Joy Driver Snowboard.

name: BOTTLE ROCKET SNOWBOARD 2017
description: Comin' at ya hotter than a Wolf Pack screamer, the K2 Bottle Rocket Snowboard is designed to propel your park riding into the stratosphere. Whether you need a solid jump board, or a battle axe for the cold hard streets, the K2 Bottle Rocket will have you whistling with confidence when you step to something big.

name: NITRO CINEMA SNOWBOARD 2016
description: A true all-terrain, freestyle board, the Nitro Cinema Snowboard is the ultimate platform for progression whether you're a pro or Joe. Learn new tricks in the park and stomp with stability and confidence, or simply learn how to link turns on the groomers--this board has something for everyone.

name: TRS XC2 BTX SNOWBOARD 2016
description: There are few podiums that the Lib Tech TRS XC2 BTX Snowboard has yet to stand upon. Lib has created this board to perform aggressively on any terrain in a variety of conditions. The main ingredient that fuels this kind of boundary-less riding is the XC2 rocker.
